abstract: Comcast, the nation’s largest cable operator, announced Wednesday that it was buying the online movie ticketing service Fandango and starting a new Web site for watching TV and movies. The new site, Fancast.com, will be in place this summer and allow users to watch on-demand shows via television, the Internet and wireless devices.
